description.value: While invisible, you can't be seen. You're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Undetected] to everyone. Creatures can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Seek] to attempt to detect you; if a creature succeeds at its Perception check against your Stealth DC, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] to that creature until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sneak] to become undetected again. If you become invisible while someone can already see you, you start out hidden to the observer (instead of undetected) until you successfully sneak. You can't become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Observed] while invisible except via special abilities or magic.
